title: Identity Tribal Warfare and the Humiliation of Christian Conversion
description:
Charles Taylor notes that the egalitarian demand for achieved identity requires us to also achieve public validation and affirmation of those identities. This intensifies identity tribal warfare creating a game of tribal Othello where the goal is to always outframe and flip the adversary. Christians play this game too and it doesn't go well because Christian conversion is ultimately a humiliation. In Christ we receive an identity, it is not achieved. 

Walter Wangarin Jr. Ragman https://amzn.to/36kdtu0
Charles Taylor Sources of the Self https://amzn.to/32ZyMyF
Charles Taylor Ethics of Authenticity https://amzn.to/2NqnNIg
Cyrus Dunham https://www.thecut.com/2019/10/cyrus-grace-dunham-lets-everyone-name-themselves.html
My Conversation with Jordan Peterson https://youtu.be/aUGGrZUFMg4
Kanye West Big Boy TV https://youtu.be/t568Nd7k_Yk
Kanye West Apple TV https://youtu.be/QuOCvKvrwI8
Brad Pitt Kanye West https://youtu.be/EdZgkM_XF0I
Tom Holland Dominion https://amzn.to/2PsYyrn
Andrew Klavan Great Good Thing https://amzn.to/2JAlq4r
Andrew Klavan Acton Institute https://youtu.be/PX60VEEbmEI
Ragman Story on YouTube https://youtu.be/Q6paKdR9dIE
Kingdom in the Streets and The Call by Ken Medema, Copywright Ken Medema
Ken Medema Music http://kenmedema.com/
